content: Wow Darius Foroux you wrote this with me mind right? Lol. As I read this I found myself drifting in and out and thought about “get out of your own head” which really means “get out your own way” you know? I really needed to read this. Perfect timing my friend. Sometimes we need to hear it from a person on the outside to better understand what we know needs to be addressed within. Great post buddy.
